description: Designed a content-based recommendation system to determine the business likely to be reviewed by unique users using review data and building user and business profiles.

Implemented collaborative filtering methods for predicting ratings of about 10,000 businesses by 26,000 users with less than 1% RMS error on real world data using optimized user based and item based collaborative filtering algorithms.

projects.projectName: Dialog Act Tagger for Sequence Labelling
description: Worked on the Switchboard Corpus(SWBD) which is a dataset of telephonic conversation between 2 people. It is a labeled set of data, which comprises speaker name, tokens and part of speech tags.

The goal of the project was to assign a sequence label to each utterance of the dialogue for which machine Learning technique,Conditional Random Fields was used, designed for sequence labelling using toolkit CRFsuite.
Experimented with the choice of features for best classification and used K-Fold Cross Validation for accuracy calculation. An accuracy of 75.089% was achieved.

projects.projectName: Neural Network for MNIST Digit Classification
description: Developed a Multi-Layer Perceptron from scratch, to classify the handwritten MNIST digit dataset (0-9). The network had 5 hidden layers, having different activation functions, including linear, Relu and Softmax.
There was also a layer to prevent overfitting, where dropout regularization was added. The network was trained for 10 epochs, and gave a training accuracy of 99.82% and validation accuracy of 95.60%.

projects.projectName: Real Time Attendance Management System using Face Recognition
description: Developed a software in python whose objective was to detect the faces in a picture, recognize them and mark attendance of students accordingly. We used face_recognition library to train the model.
The model was trained using a benchmark dataset â€“ Ferret and with our own dataset of around 17 people. The model was able to secure an accuracy of around 93%.
Developed an application in Android using Java from scratch that can be used by the teacher to take attendance of the students and to store the marks of the students.
Students could use this application to check their academic status.
